long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never miss picking up your children again with the "Parents Reminder"! This user-friendly browser extension is designed to help busy parents effortlessly manage their children’s schedules.

Key Features:
- Simple Interface: Add your child's schedule effortlessly and receive timely notifications.
- Customizable Notifications: Choose when you want to be reminded before pickup time.
- Flexible Time Formats: Supports both 24-hour and 12-hour formats with AM/PM options.
- Privacy Focused: Use any name in the schedule to maintain privacy.
- Visual Alerts: Receive discreet badge text notifications on the extension icon.
- Voice Notifications: Stay updated with voice reminders directly from your browser.
- Dark Mode: Automatically switches to a dark theme in the evening to reduce eye strain.

Why Choose "Parents Reminder"?
As a father who struggled to manage my children's varying schedules without cluttering my phone's calendar, I built this extension to solve that problem. Now, you can stay on top of your children’s pickups directly from your browser.

How It Works:
- Install the Extension: Add "Parents Reminder" to your Chrome browser.
- Pin the Extension: After installing, pin it to your toolbar for easy access.
- Set Up Schedules: Add your child’s schedule and select notification times.
- Stay Notified: Get visual and voice notifications right on your browser, with a badge displaying your child's name (up to 4 characters).

Customization Options:
- Change the default 24-hour clock to a 12-hour format if preferred.
- Enable or disable notifications as needed.
- Edit or delete schedules easily with a click.

Note: Remember to pin the extension to your toolbar for uninterrupted notifications—it won’t do this automatically.

Download the "Parents Reminder" today and simplify your daily routine!
